text: (sa:yu - sitha hariyatama damanaya kara gatha hakke purusha lingu aththanta pamani) pa/li - me therumak nathi prashna asima meyin nawathiya yuthuya.
uthuru palathe karyalawala, margawala namapuwaru wenas kirimedi sinhala bhashawen sthana namkirimedi waradi bohomayak siduwela thibuna.

mewara parlimenthu mathiwaranayen, kurunagala disthrikkaye janathawa labadena shakthiya matha janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahathage maga penwima yatathe kurunagala disthrikkaye mathiwarana kottasa 14 thulama sama kshethrayatama wihidi yana salasum sahagatha sanwardhana wada piliwelak kriyawata nanwimata da mama apeksha karami.wayambaa palathe, kurunagala disthrikkaye warimarga ha jala sampadanaya wadi diyunu kirima, krushikarmika sanwardhanaya, marga ha mahamarga sanwardhanaya, adhyapana sanwardhanaya ha raki raksha prashnayata wisandum labadima, athulu janathawage dawena prashna siyallatama wisandum labademin merata jathika aarthikaya shakthimath kota jana diwiya ihala sarthakathwayata pathkerena prayogika wadapiliwela idiriye di kriyathmaka kirimata mama balaporoththu wemi.jala pahasukamshakthimath wari marga paddhathiyak pawathi kurunagala disawe warimarga ha jala sampadanaya wadi diyunu kirima athyawashya karunak lesa handunagena atha.

apata gatha haki piyawara aaloka dushanaya awama kirima sandaha apata dayaka wiya haki aakara kihipayak pahatha dakwe.  elimahan pradeshawala di adhika aalokayak nikuth karana aaloka prabhawa bhawithaya sima kirima.  ape awashyathawata pramanawath thiwrathawak athi aaloka prabhawa pamanak yodaganima.  aalokaya awashya pradeshawalata pamanak yomu wimata salaswima.  elimahane ho gruhasthawa bhawitha wana anawashya siyalu widuli aaloka prabhawa niwa damima.  uthsawa awasthawala di bhawitha wana widuli aaloka pramanaya pilibandawa salakilimath wima.  aaloka dushanaya ha ehi balapam pilibandawa an aya danumwath kirima.

esema, wariyapola (wa=wayu, riya=riya, pola=thotupola ) dandumonara guwanthotupolak thibu bawath, mathale yanu dandumonara niyamu mathalige gama bawath, mannarama (manu aa arama ) yanu manu rajathuma pamini thana bawath, aprikawa (apri=apriya wu, ka=kapiriyan) yanu rawana rajathumata apriya wu kapiriyan wa damu dwipaya bawath, ethuma wisin purawidyathmakawa oppu kara atha.
